title: Maldives Premium All-Inclusive Private Island Retreat with Free-Flow Drinks, Massages & Roundtrip Domestic Speedboat Transfers
description: Dive deep into tropical splendour at the five-star Taj Coral Reef Resort, a vibrant jewel occupying a private island in the Maldives. Offering access to some of the world’s most renowned dive sites and protected coral reefs, this idyllic resort is a haven for snorkellers and diving enthusiasts. Claiming the World Luxury Hotel Awards' 2022 best premium all-inclusive luxury villa award, this collection of premium beachfront villas boasts secluded coastal opulence just a 45-minute speedboat ride from Malé  (with roundtrip transfers included). Dip your toe into true indulgence with a massage at J Wellness Circle, a waterfront romantic dinner for two as well as premium all-inclusive dining and refreshing free-flow drinks, including select cocktails, spirits, wine and beer, from sunrise to sundown.
